metadata.title: CVE-2023-6213 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 119. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 120.

criterions.comment: firefox package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
